item.description:
Get hypnotized starring Peter Gross! A crowd pleaser, he turns stage-shy volunteers into performing super stars... full of laughs and audience participation. A 70 min show..he has performed on cruise ships etc....tickets are $15.00.

We will be eating either before or after show. There will be a deadline of Jan 14 in order to get block of tickets. All monies should be in hand by that date. Please send your check to Chuck Quint, 125 Ford Road, Windsor, CT 06095 ASAP.

Please join us for a unique experience and GET HYPNOTIZED!!!
..
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Chuck in the Lobby...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!
